Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: IsiGaneko1 esimiselwenguAllâhsizakufika, ningasingxameli. Makazukiswe, Adunyiswe Yena ngaphezulu kwazo zonke izinto abazayamanisa naYe bazenze amahlulelane aKhe

Yena Uthumela iingelosi zihle noMoya (oyiNgcwele) ngokoMyalelo waKhe phezu kwalowoAthandileyo kwizicaka zaKhe. (Athi kuye): “Lumkisa abantu okokuba akukho thixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaM. Noyike Mna futhi
Yena Udale amazulu nomhlaba ngenyaniso. Uphakamile Yena, Ungentla kwazo zonke ezo zinto bazayamanisa, bazenze amahlulelane aKhe
Yena Udale umntu ngeNutfah2 kodwa yabona! Kwayena lo (mntu) uphinda abe ngumphikisi oselubala (ka-Allâh)
Ukanti Yena Unidalele impahla (efuywayo); kuyo leyo nifumana ukufudumala nezinye izinto ezininzi eziyinzuzo, kanti kwazona niyazitya
Kananjalo kuzo apho nifumana umfaneleko xa nizibuyisela ekhaya ngenjikalanga, naxa nizikhokelela emadlelweni kusasa
Zinithwalela imithwalo yenu ziyise ezindaweni ebeningekhe nifike kuzo ningathanga nifumane ubunzima. Inene, iNkosi yenu Inemfesane, nguSozinceba
Yena Unidalele amahashe, ama-esile neembongolo ukuba niziqabele kwanokuba zibe ngumfaneleko kuni, ukanti Udale nezinye izinto nina eningenalwazi ngazo
Loluka-Allâh uxanduva lokucacisa iNdlela ethe Tye. Kodwa kukho iindlela eziphambukela ecaleni kwaye Yena ukuba Ebethanda Ebenganikhokela nonke
